history.content:
Looking at your **unicorn** space, you have a nice collection of **19 assets** that appear to be for a fantasy RPG-style game. Here's what's here:

## Characters (10)
| Name | Variants | Notes |
|------|----------|-------|
| **knight** | 16 variants | Your most developed character |
| **Silver Armored Warrior** | 3 variants | |
| **White Knight** | 1 | |
| **Red Royal Mage** | 1 | |
| **Princess** | 1 | |
| **Spiky Goblin** | 1 | |
| **Blue Slime Monster** | 1 | |
| **Blue Slime** | 1 | |
| **Goblin** | 8 variants | Composite type |
| **Goblin Warior** | 1 | Composite type |
| **Goblin Mage** | 1 | (two versions exist) |

## Items (5)
| Name | Type |
|------|------|
| **Fantasy Sword** | Weapon |
| **Knight's Shield** | Defense |
| **Health Potion** | Consumable |
| **Health Potion Bottle** | Consumable |
| **Mana Potion Bottle** | Consumable |
| **Gold Coin Pile** | Currency/Loot |

## Scenes (1)
| Name | Notes |
|------|-------|
| **Game Scene** | Composite type |

---

It looks like you're building out a **chibi/storybook fantasy game** asset set with:
- A party of heroes (knights, mage, princess)
- Enemies (goblins, slimes)
- Essential RPG items (weapons, potions, gold)
- At least one game scene

Would you like me to **analyze any of these assets** to see what they look like, **create new assets** to expand your collection, or **refine existing ones**?
